pageContent.descriptionText: Welcome to the Otsuka Sales Accelerator Simulation. In this second round of the simulation you will have a chance to practice the strategies you’ve learned for asking customers questions that drive accelerated selling. You’ll be competing against your peers. You will be applying the ROPE questioning model you learned: Results Opportunities Problems Execution On each screen, you’ll choose from a set of possible questions and decide which is the best one to ask at that point in the conversation. Based on your selection, you will receive a score that can range from +50 points, for the best choice, to -20 points, for the worst choice. So, make your decisions carefully. Your scoring will be cumulative, and at the end of the simulation you’ll be able to compare your performance to that of other teams. Each of the possible questions you consider has been rated according to the following individual metrics, so your score will reflect whether your decision making is in line with these characteristics as well.
